Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Le Moyne
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North Ave due to, street blockage near Austin/Le Moyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North Ave due to, street blockage near Austin/Le Moyne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at 69th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at 69th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
